name: FNF Tricky Test (Bot Studio)
description:
It's Tricky from Madness Combat from Newgrounds! He is the nemesis of Hank J, who will be coming to Friday Night Funkin in Week 8! Go crazy with Tricky's beeps and bops! Play as Tricky Masked and Tricky Unmasked! Play on the web here on a PC/Mobile devices! If you want, you can download it with the download button below for Windows, Mac, and Linux systems!

Controls: 

When you load up the game, if you want touch control, press the toggle in the corner for the virtual controls button. I also recommend playing this on Google Chrome on mobile.  

Arrow keys to play the sounds (For mobile press D-pad button)

Press Alt (For mobile, press A Button) for Tricky Unmasked only for a scream!

Click on the Tricky icon on the corner to switch between Tricky Masked and Tricky Unmasked 

Secret key = ??? ;)

Hold any of the buttons to hold a pose!

Check out the Friday Night Funkin here: https://ninja-muffin24.itch.io/funkin

Also check out Friday Night Funkin on Newgrounds: https://www.newgrounds.com/portal/view/770371
